attributes.action: Abolish Home Office Plans to create a database recording every phone call, sms, email and time spent on the internet by the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Home Office is attempting to create a data base that will invade the privacy of every person in the UK.  The Communications Data Bill will destroy our basic freedom to communicate with each other without Government interference.  If the Government feels there is a real need for this then hold a referendum on the subject.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
